overview: SCANDAL FIRST LIVE -BEST★SCANDAL 2009- is the first DVD released by SCANDAL. It contains footage of their first one-man live tour, titled First One-Man Live Tour. The fourth date, BEST★Xmas, was added after the first three sold out. The DVD reached #5 on the Oricon overall DVD charts and charted for seven weeks.
title: SCANDAL FIRST LIVE -BEST★SCANDAL 2009-
